text: "Not Alone" is a song by Armenian singer Aram Mp3. This song was selected to represent Armenia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2014 in Denmark. == Music video == The video was set in the Armenian capital Yerevan. The video shows a boyfriend and girlfriend having a fight in the girlfriend's car. The boyfriend's frustration then leads him to leave the car, which leaves both of them crying. == Live performances == This song was performed in the Eurovision concert in Amsterdam. Category:2014 songs
title: Not Alone (Aram Mp3 song)
